settings.content_html:
How It Works

When you sign up for The Sampler, every month you will receive a box of carefully selected products and presents. A portion of the proceeds will be donated to a good cause.

Sorry, we are currently sold out.

We know you want macaroons, but we're at capacity for this month. Don't worry though, because we have more goodies coming next month!
